arts.ttl: Manchester United vs. Wolves: Matheus Cunha bidding to join exclusive club in Premier League game
arts.sum: Wolverhampton Wanderers forward Matheus Cunha will be bidding to join an exclusive club in Sunday's Premier League fixture against Manchester United at Old Trafford.

arts.ttl: Manchester United: Ruben Amorim drops Chido Obi selection hint amid praise for Matheus Cunha
arts.sum: The youngster is set to be trusted in the league with the focus on Europe
